name: Saqib Mustafa Abbasi
objective: Obtain a challenging position providing opportunities to hone my professional skills and effectively contribute to organizational progress and simultaneously provide opportunities for career development and personal growth.
details: I'm an IT professional having proven knowledge in domains like business analysis, software engineering, software integration, migration. My invaluable experience spanning over a decade in IT emanates from working as a Software Engineer Technical analyst and later as Business Analyst. I have proven my mettle in various spheres of IT.
